attributes.action: Ban The Use Of 4x4 Vehicles Outside Of Farms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The impact that a standard 4x4 vehicle has upon the environment is catastrophic.  The majority of owners only use them to take their children to and from school.  The only people who actually require them are farmers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
